meanings.definition: Giving a clear and vivid picture; vividly descriptive
meanings.sent1: The book had a graphic description of the storm, making it easy to imagine.
meanings.sent2: The graphic details in the painting brought the scene to life.
meanings.sent3: The graphic explanation of how to make a sandwich was both helpful and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted a graphic picture of the bustling city streets.
meanings.sent5: The graphic illustration of the solar system made learning about planets exciting.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to visual art, especially involving drawing, engraving, or lettering
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed graphic paintings from famous artists.
meanings.sent2: She studied graphic design to create beautiful logos.
meanings.sent3: The graphic patterns on her dress caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a graphic masterpiece, carefully crafted and detailed.
meanings.sent5: The graphic images in the art gallery were truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: A visual representation or design, especially in a printed or digital form
meanings.sent1: The magazine cover featured a colorful graphic of a city skyline.
meanings.sent2: She created a graphic for the website using vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The graphic on the billboard made people stop and stare.
meanings.sent4: The graphic on the t-shirt was a hit among teenagers.
meanings.sent5: The graphic on the poster was so eye-catching that it drew a crowd.
